text: Issi waja say hum ney bani israeel per yeh likh diya kay jo shaks kissi ko baghair iss kay, kay woh kissi ka qatil ho ya zamin mein fasaad machaney wala ho qatal ker daalay to goya uss ney tamam logon ko qatal ker diya aur jo shaks kissi aik ki jaan bacha ley uss ney goya tamam logon ko zinda ker diya aur unn kay pass humara boht say rasool zahir daleelen ley ker aaye lekin phir uss kay baad bhi unn mein kay aksar log zamin mein zulm-o-ziyadti aur zabadasti kerney walay hi rahey
